content: समर्थ् {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To believe, consider, regard, think; समर्थये यत्प्रथमं प्रियां प्रति <ls>V. 4. 39</ls>; मया न साधु समर्थितं <ls>V. 2</ls>; अनुपयुक्तमिव आत्मानं समर्थये <ls>Ś. 7</ls>, <ls n="Ś.">3. 19.</ls> {@--2@} To corroborate, support, substantiate by proof; उक्तमेवार्थमुदाहरणेन समर्थयति. {@--3@} To deliberate, think or reflect about. {@--4@} To make ready, prepare. {@--5@} To maintain, assert, enforce. {@--6@} To imply, suggest. {@--7@} To approve.
